mapper.select: SELECT mt.*, m.memNickName FROM mytip_board mt JOIN member m ON mt.memId = m.memId WHERE mt.petCtgNo = #{petCtgNo} ORDER BY postLike DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mytip_board (postTitle, memId, postDate, postContent, petCtgNo, postImg) VALUES (#{postTitle}, #{memId}, NOW(), #{postContent}, #{petCtgNo}, #{postImgBytes})
